examples.example: 我给自己定了个目标，要在一百天内学会这门新技能。

translate.english: I set a goal for myself to learn this new skill within one hundred days.

examples.example: 我要用这一百天的时间努力提升自己，让自己变得更加优秀。

translate.english: I will use these one hundred days to strive to improve myself and make myself more excellent.

examples.example: 我要用一百天的时间来阅读经典书籍，丰富自己的内涵。

translate.english: I will use one hundred days to read classic books to enrich my connotation.
